General.Name: Lakeshore Acquisition II Corp
General.Description: Lakeshore Acquisition II Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, recapitalization, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 667 Madison Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10065
